displayName.german: Kümmer dich um deine eigene Stempel

description.japanese: すべての御朱印を獲得する

description.english: Confront the black dragon and embrace the dazzling light.
description.schinese: 与黑龙冲突，被耀眼的光芒包围
description.tchinese: 和黑龍展開激戰，被耀眼的光芒所籠罩

description.french: Affronter la dragonne noire et obtenir la lumière radieuse.
description.spanish: Enfréntate a la dragona negra y recibe la luz fulgurante.

description.japanese: おにぎりを自分の力で作成する

description.english: Return Woolby to his true form.

description.english: Drive back the black dragon and her rider.
